landscape_overview.title: Global Metformin Clinical Trial Landscape
landscape_overview.description: Multiple trials are evaluating Metformin's anticancer effects across various tumor types.

phase_distribution.title: Trial Phase Distribution
phase_distribution.description: Predominance of Phase II trials reflects exploratory studies in oncology contexts.

sponsor_profile.title: Sponsor & Research Profile
sponsor_profile.description: Mix of industry and academic sponsors investigating Metformin's role in cancer.

landscape_overview.title: Global Sildenafil Clinical Trial Landscape
landscape_overview.description: Sildenafil trials are focused on pulmonary conditions including altitude sickness and HAPE.

phase_distribution.title: Trial Phase Distribution
phase_distribution.description: Several Phase II studies explore efficacy for acute mountain sickness.

sponsor_profile.title: Sponsor & Research Profile
sponsor_profile.description: Research led by military and academia on altitude applications.

landscape_overview.title: Global Adalimumab Clinical Trial Landscape
landscape_overview.description: Investigation into anti-TNF therapies for lung fibrosis is nascent, with few active studies.

phase_distribution.title: Trial Phase Distribution
phase_distribution.description: Predominantly Phase II trials targeting fibrotic lung disease.

sponsor_profile.title: Sponsor & Research Profile
sponsor_profile.description: Single industry study with additional investigator-led trials.

landscape_overview.title: Global Fluoxetine Clinical Trial Landscape
landscape_overview.description: Fluoxetine trials in neurodegenerative disease are limited, focusing on symptomatic outcomes.

phase_distribution.title: Trial Phase Distribution
phase_distribution.description: Early-phase trials predominate; no large Phase III studies yet.

sponsor_profile.title: Sponsor & Research Profile
sponsor_profile.description: Mixed sponsorship suggests experimental exploration in neurology.

landscape_overview.title: Global Pembrolizumab Clinical Trial Landscape
landscape_overview.description: Exploratory trials are evaluating immunotherapy effects in NASH.

phase_distribution.title: Trial Phase Distribution
phase_distribution.description: Only early-phase trials are underway for NASH.

sponsor_profile.title: Sponsor & Research Profile
sponsor_profile.description: Collaboration between Merck and academic centers investigating NASH.

landscape_overview.title: Global Omeprazole Clinical Trial Landscape
landscape_overview.description: Few trials examine PPI effects on bone health; evidence is largely from observational studies.

phase_distribution.title: Trial Phase Distribution
phase_distribution.description: Limited interventional studies; mostly association analyses.

sponsor_profile.title: Sponsor & Research Profile
sponsor_profile.description: Small-scale trials funded by pharma and government.

landscape_overview.title: Global Rituximab Clinical Trial Landscape
landscape_overview.description: Investigations of B-cell depletion in Parkinson's disease are highly experimental.

phase_distribution.title: Trial Phase Distribution
phase_distribution.description: Only a handful of exploratory studies; no late-stage trials.

sponsor_profile.title: Sponsor & Research Profile
sponsor_profile.description: Preliminary study by an academic neurology group.

landscape_overview.title: Global Ketamine Clinical Trial Landscape
landscape_overview.description: Multiple trials explore ketamine for chronic pain, reflecting growing interest in NMDA-targeted therapies.

phase_distribution.title: Trial Phase Distribution
phase_distribution.description: Several Phase II trials, few progressed to Phase III for chronic pain.

sponsor_profile.title: Sponsor & Research Profile
sponsor_profile.description: Combination of industry and NIH-sponsored trials on ketamine pain use.

landscape_overview.title: Global Pioglitazone Clinical Trial Landscape
landscape_overview.description: Pioglitazone has been studied in Alzheimer's and neurodegeneration, with some Phase III evidence.

phase_distribution.title: Trial Phase Distribution
phase_distribution.description: Notable number of trials including completed Phase III studies.

sponsor_profile.title: Sponsor & Research Profile
sponsor_profile.description: Industry-led large trials alongside NIH-supported studies.

landscape_overview.title: Global Ivermectin Clinical Trial Landscape
landscape_overview.description: Ivermectin's anti-cancer potential is under early investigation, mostly in vitro and small human trials.

phase_distribution.title: Trial Phase Distribution
phase_distribution.description: Primarily early-phase, mechanism-finding trials in oncology.

sponsor_profile.title: Sponsor & Research Profile
sponsor_profile.description: Niche research groups testing Ivermectin's anticancer effects.
